name: westland-warrior-the-sculptor
title: The Sculptor
html:
Quote by Auguste Rodin

Where did I learn to understand sculpture? In the woods by looking at the trees, along roads by observing the formation of clouds, in the studio by studying the model, everywhere except in the schools.

Auguste Rodin

Cubli

Play Video

Water No. 33 by Dean O'Callaghan

Play Video

Colibri by Derek Hugger

Play Video

Kinetic Sculptures Intro

Play Video

Kinetic sculptures by Alex Harrell

Play Video

Kinetic Sculpture by David Roy

Play Video

Kinetic Masterpieces by Anthony Howe

Play Video

Wintergatan by Martin Molin

Play Video

Blender is a Free and Open Source Program with a large developer community.

Play Video

B3d/ZB/MD: Threadox Pt.1

Play Video

Blender 2.8 Mecha Sculpting In Dyntopo - Blender Tutorial

Play Video

Zbrush is a commercial product priced at $1,000.

(I recommend learning Blender)

Organic Sculpting with Maria Panfilova

Play Video

Joker Speed Art (Zbrush)

Play Video

Speedsculpt Zbrush

Play Video

Air Dry Clay

Air Dry clay can be purchased for $25 for 25lb at Amazon

Speed Sculpting - What you NEED to Know

Play Video

3D Printing

Shapeways offer printing services, but you can also purchase your own 3D Printer for quicker prototyping

3D Printing Cast Metals via Shapeways

Play Video

Why This Is the Best 3D Printer - Comparing ALL My Printers!!!

Play Video

Business Practice: Shapeways Laser Printing

Sell your 3D models through Printing on Demand (POD, printing only when someone pays for your product) at Shapeways and similar 3d print shops. Shapeways created shapejs a programmable product creator with many examples in JavaScript, this can be used to generate a large number of unique products (antique coin pendants, tiny statues of art in public domain, odd bobble heads, skeleton wallets, waveform rings, UPC/QR code bracelets or keychain doodads.).

Business Practice: Scanned Model Sales

You are not limited to digital models, you can experiment with 3d scanners as well. Take a look at the Shapeways Marketplace for more ideas.

Explaining 3D Scanning

Play Video

Best 3D Scanners 2019

Play Video
